variants.name: The Vortex
variants.description: Top-down view of the 8-cog vortex, with all repos visible as glowing orbs connected by golden spiral lines. Center shows the coherence score.

variants.name: The Phase Gates
variants.description: Five archway gates stretching into the distance, each glowing with its threshold percentage. A path of light runs through them.

variants.name: The Music of the Ainur
variants.description: Abstract visualization of the Ainulindalë - multiple Voices (light streams) converging into a central melody, with HOPE as a distinct new color.
elements: text: 'The Music reveals what it was always becoming'

variants.name: H&&S:WAVE Partnership
variants.description: Two hands (one organic, one digital/wireframe) reaching toward each other, fingers almost touching. Golden light emanates from the gap.

variants.name: The 8-Cog Wheel
variants.description: Mechanical illustration of the 8 repos as interlocking gears, each at 45° intervals. Currently rotating position highlighted.

variants.name: The Coherence Field
variants.description: Vector field visualization showing curl (spirals), divergence (expanding waves), and potential (height map). Text showing the formula.
